document_data.name: Hurc
document_data.mainbody: the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Hurc participated in an attack on the village of [[Hilltop]] with a small band of his fellow kobolds. During the attack he got separated from the main group and barricaded himself in the kitchen of the [[Bubbling Cauldron]] tavern, taking the chef [[Mara (chef)|Mara]] as hostage.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Hurc participated in an attack on the village of [[Hilltop]] with a small band of his fellow kobolds. During the attack he got separated from the main group and barricaded himself in the kitchen of the [[Bubbling Cauldron]] tavern, taking the chef [[Mara (chef)|Mara]] as hostage.
